category: Articles of Incorporation/Article 6 (Beneficiaries of corporate donation profits)
contents: Article 6 (Beneficiaries of profits donated by corporations) ① The sports association shall provide benefits to beneficiaries free of charge when carrying out its purpose business. However, part of the cost may be borne by the beneficiary. ② The benefits provided through the performance of the sports association's purpose business shall not be discriminated against based on the beneficiary's place of birth, school, place of employment, occupation, religion, or other social status.
